viewData.name: PhiHair Extension Brush Large
viewData.short_description: A special care hair brush designed for advanced smoothing, styling, and detangling of both natural hair or extensions.
viewData.long_description: Ultra-flexible, extra-long bristles means you can expect volume-building and styling power, without tension or instigating frizz. The fine bristles are extremely gentle on your hair follicles, ensuring that your hair stays healthy, while the bristle ends offer a soothing scalp massage, stimulating hair follicles circulation, which slightly affects hair growth.
